amendatorysection.chaptername: State University, State Colleges, and Postsecondary Education
amendatorysection.para: The Nebraska College of Technical Agriculture at Curtis or any educational program of such college shall be subject to program review pursuant to the Coordinating Commission for Postsecondary Education Act.

crossreference.para: Coordinating Commission for Postsecondary Education Act, see section 85-1401.
